# tf.config.optimizer.get_jit


<table class="tfo-notebook-buttons tfo-api" align="left">

<td>
  <a target="_blank" href="/api_docs/python/tf/config/optimizer/get_jit">

Get if JIT compilation is enabled.

### Aliases:

* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/config/optimizer/get_jit"><code>tf.compat.v1.config.optimizer.get_jit</code></a>
* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/config/optimizer/get_jit"><code>tf.compat.v2.config.optimizer.get_jit</code></a>


``` python
tf.config.optimizer.get_jit()
```



<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->

Note that optimizations are only applied in graph mode, (within tf.function).

#### Returns:

If JIT compilation is enabled.
